description:
This switch was specifically designed for use in low-gauss fields. A new internal sensing element provides increased sensitivity, fast response, greater actuation distance, and low hysteresis. Magnet Actuators of varying designs are available for varying applications. Magnet Actuators are constructed of 316 SS, with imbedded magnets sealed from the seawater ambient. Hydracon Switches meet IPX8 of IEC 529 for protection against the effects of continuous immersion in water.

Options:
1) Titanium for deeper depths, long-term immersion and corrosion resistance.
2) Ambient pressure at 5,000 or 9,000 PSI. 
3) Termination options:  Single-pin underwater connectors, molded cable with connector, PBOF (Pressure Balanced Oil Filled).
4) Available as limit switch.
